properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 8:59AM PST until February 12 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, steep seas 7 to 9 ft.

* WHERE...Beyond 2 NM from shore south of Gold Beach and beyond 10
NM from shore north of Gold Beach.

* WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Steep seas could capsize or damage smaller vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IS CANCELLED
